page.title: 06CLUBS PUBS ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Shotts possesses over 20 pubs and clubs,which provide a variety of entertainment.The clubs are run by committees on behalf of members:the pubs are businesses. The entertainers are usually either comedians or musicians.The musicians are mostly pop artistes or country and western specialists.Many of them have other regular jobs.Discos are very popular i.e.dancing to pop music recordings. There is now no cinema in Shotts. Television and video recordings take its place. There are a number of organisations such as parent teacher associations and charitable societies which organise dances,concerts,bingo etc. at intervals.
